skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: luther's wit
des:
Luther's wit is a parody insult skill inspired by the popular BabylonBee article . It's meant to make you laugh and can be a useful way to find creative insults for your friends.

https://babylonbee.com/news/new-martin-luther-shaped-amazon-echo-will-rudely-answer-theology-questions
https://ergofabulous.org/luther/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
